overview: Directed by Celeste, Gabriella Fox Sexy Hot captures Digital Playground's fresh new star, Gabriella Fox in two indescribably delectable and ultra-horny scenes. The Sexy Hot series exploits the control and power of pure seduction. Lovely Gabriella stars alongside Shawna Lenee, Jandi Lin & Carmella Santiago in plays of passion with countless mind-blowing, knee-shaking, earth-shattering orgasms! This star vehicle is a finely crafted and very tasty adventure that will leave you craving more and more of the gorgeous Gabriella Fox.
title: Gabriella Fox: Sexy Hot
